snippet: Andy Murray squandered a 4-1 lead in the third set before losing a tiebreaker to world number 53 Federico Delbonis and exiting the BNP Paribas Open third round 6-4 4-6 7-6(3) in California on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray squandered a 4-1 lead in the third set before losing a tiebreaker to world number 53 Federico Delbonis and exiting the BNP Paribas Open third round 6-4 4-6 7-6(3) in California on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Stunned by Delbonis at Indian Wells
headline.main: Murray Stunned by Delbonis at Indian Wells
